name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Back-End Leaning Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and microservices architecture. Expert in designing and developing robust REST APIs and proficient in using **MongoDB** as a NoSQL database solution. Skilled in **JavaScript** frameworks with a solid background in both frontend and backend development and well-versed in creating responsive UIs using **HTML** and **CSS**. Experienced in deploying and managing applications in **Azure Cloud**, ensuring smooth and containerized deployments. 
Passionate about problem-solving and proactive in enhancing application performance and user experience. Committed to delivering high-quality solutions in compliance with industry standards, specifically within healthcare and financial services.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to design and build full-stack applications, ensuring optimal performance and security.
Developed and integrated **REST APIs** facilitating seamless communication between microservices and frontend components within scalable architectures.
Employed **MongoDB** as the primary **NoSQL database** solution, supporting efficient data storage and retrieval for high-traffic applications.
Implemented microservices architecture to enhance system resilience and maintainability, focusing on containerized deployments using **Docker**.
Built responsive web interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and JavaScript to ensure a user-friendly experience across devices.
Demonstrated a proactive mindset by identifying bottlenecks and implementing optimizations resulting in performance improvements of up to **25%**.
Engaged in problem-solving to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges across the full stack, promoting operational efficiency.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver solutions in line with project timelines, achieving a **95%** on-time delivery rate.
Utilized **Azure Cloud** services for deploying applications, enhancing reliability and scalability through effective cloud solutions.
Maintained comprehensive documentation of all back-end processes and APIs to ensure clarity and facilitate future development.
Adapted to evolving technologies and frameworks, continuously enhancing skill set in line with industry standards.

• Leveraged **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to **microservices architecture**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
• Developed REST APIs using **JavaScript** and **NoSQL databases** like **MongoDB** to support front-end functionalities and data management with a focus on performance and reliability.
• Engaged in containerized deployments to streamline application delivery across environments, ensuring consistency and quick iteration.
• Built interactive front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, employing design systems powered by **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards driven by **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, which provided operations teams with instant insights into **transactions and anomalies** based on data from over **1 million** daily records.
• Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
• Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources leveraging **Python** with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing for up to **10 TB** of data monthly.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, enhancing operational decision-making.

Utilized **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to design and optimize backend services in a **Microservices architecture** for a global e-commerce platform, achieving high availability and scalability across core functionalities like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Developed robust **REST APIs** to facilitate seamless communication between services and distributed systems, contributing to a smooth user experience with performance metrics showing an improvement in response times by **30%**.
Implemented **NoSQL databases** like **MongoDB** for flexible and high-performance data storage solutions, enabling fast access and scalability for high-traffic e-commerce operations, achieving reduced read latency by **25%**.
Engineered client-side applications with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, creating responsive and engaging UIs that adhere to mobile-first principles, resulting in a **20%** increase in user engagement metrics.
Adopted containerized deployments to streamline application delivery, utilizing **Azure Cloud** services for enhanced reliability and scalability with deployment success rates exceeding **98%**.
Collaborated in agile teams to troubleshoot and solve complex problems leveraging a proactive mindset, facilitating timely feature delivery and maintenance of service-level agreements (SLAs).
Ensured secure application access by implementing role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 protocols, aligning with GDPR compliance standards for user data protection across the platform.
Employed **Microservices architecture** principles to develop and maintain an evolving tech stack conducive to agile development practices, fostering a collaborative environment among cross-functional teams.
